/ywg/ - Yokai Watch General #9

[Report] Image search: [Google]

File: kyuubi2.png (424 KB, 800x807) Image search: [Google]

424 KB, 800x807

/ywg/ - Yokai Watch General #9 Anonymous Post No. 123414124 [Report]

Thirsty Foxboy Edition

Previous Thread: >>123243983

>Is this actually good?

Yes it's good, just don't go in expecting the hyped up "Pokemon killer" aspect. They aren't the same game at all, just two games in the monster catching genre. If you want an explanation on the battle system, someone can fill you in, don't worry the demo was indeed shit.

>Is there a list of all the yokai?

http://yokaipedia.net/list-of-youkai/

Some aren't available until Yokai Watch 2, though. Use the wikia to find out.

>I'm too lazy to look for i-

http://yokaiwatch.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page

Here's a resource bin including detailed maps, Yokai locations, warp locations, evolution and fusion lists:

http://pastebin.com/kTfAcURn

>>

A lot has been invested in the stateside release, and I reckon it'll be only the people who were going to buy it anyway will be the ones who retain any interest.

My job involves going to stores like Walmart and Target, and the kidderlings are still asking for Pokemon, Terraria, Skylanders, and Cowadoodie. Not a whisper of Yokai Watch.
